title: [Self-Directed] Effective Online Mathematics Learning Space Design and Operation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency with online learning tools (Zoom) and understanding of elementary math curriculum concepts
context.additional_context: Requires learning design focused on real-time interaction and task performance in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles of designing online mathematics learning spaces based on modern learning theories.
Learners can implement at least two real-time interaction strategies applicable in smartphone environments.
Learners can propose at least one method for analyzing learner engagement using formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
